INFORMATION-TO-TRANSLATORS.1: Names that are between the symbols [ ] are variables, do not translate them.
INFORMATION-TO-TRANSLATORS.2: Verify if there are any mistakes, typos before submitting
INFORMATION-TO-TRANSLATORS.3: Only translate the values and not the keys, e.g: ''my_key'': ''my value!''
INFORMATION-TO-TRANSLATORS.4: Scroll down to find your language, if it doesn't exist already, you can make it by Copy & Paste the whole 'EN' section
INFORMATION-TO-TRANSLATORS.5: Section name must be language initials e.g Japan = JAP

EN.configuration_description: Configure Miyuchan Pocket for your profile
EN.configuration_update: Your profile has been updated with a latest feature, re-do `/configuration` to see it! :smile:
EN.modal_lang_error: Oops! An error occured :confused: Are you sure the lang is correct?
EN.modal_yes_no_confirm:
Correctly added/removed the reply :smile: You can now use it via **Applications > 'Yes/No' Replies
Please note the reply is taken randomly!
EN.modal_yes_no_error: Oops! It seems an error occured :confused: ||Maybe the reply already exists ?||
EN.bookmark_message_saved_description: You can view your saved messages with `/view bookmarks`
EN.bookmark_error_too_many_items: Oops! It seems there are too many items to show :confused:
EN.weather_error_location: Please be sure the location is correct
EN.embed_error_empty: Oops! You tried to send an empty embed :confused:
EN.begin_cafe_followup: To have a look on your cafe please do `/cafe`
EN.cafe_served:
:coffee: An amount of [COFFEE]x coffees was served in the cafe **+[POINTS]** :coin:
-# +[BONUS]:coin: Bonus
EN.all_maids_unlocked: Oops! It seems you already have all maids available! Congrats!
EN.not_enough_points_maid: Oops! It seems you don't have enough points to recruit a new maid :confused:
EN.color_error: Oops! Either you bet 0 points or you bet points you don't have :confused:
EN.fish_catch: :fishing_pole_and_fish: You caught [AMOUNT] fishes and got **[AMOUNT] Points**
EN.fish_catch_legendary: **:tropical_fish: You caught an epic fish! __+[AMOUNT] Points__**

FR.configuration_description: Configure Miyuchan Pocket pour ton profile
FR.configuration_update: Ton profil a été mis à jour, refais `/configuration` pour la voir! :smile:
FR.modal_lang_error: Oups! Une erreur s'est produite :confused: Es-tu sûr d'avoir entré une langue disponible?
FR.modal_yes_no_confirm:
La réponse a correctement été ajoutée/effacée :smile: Tu peux maintenant l'utiliser via **Applications > 'Yes/No' Replies
PS: La réponse est prise aléatoirement!
FR.modal_yes_no_error: Oups! Une erreur s'est produite :confused: ||Peut-être que la réponse existe déjà ?||
FR.bookmark_message_saved_description: Tu peux voir les messages sauvegardés avec le /view bookmarks
FR.bookmark_error_too_many_items: Oups! Il semble qu'il y ait trop de choses à afficher :confused:
FR.weather_error_location: Sois sûr que l'endroit indiqué est correct
FR.embed_error_empty: Oups! Tu as essayé d'envoyer un embed vide :confused:
FR.cafe_served:
:coffee: Un nombre de [COFFEE]x cafés a été servi **+[POINTS]** :coin:
-# +[BONUS]:coin: Bonus
FR.all_maids_unlocked: Oups! Il semble que tu ais débloqué toutes les maids! Félicitations!
FR.not_enough_points_maid: Oups! Il semble que tu n'ais pas assez de points pour recruter une maid :confused:
FR.color_error: Oups! Soit tu as misé 0 point, soit tu as misé des points que tu n'as pas :confused:
FR.fish_catch: :fishing_pole_and_fish: Tu as pêché [AMOUNT] poissons et récupères **[AMOUNT] Points**
FR.fish_catch_legendary: **:tropical_fish: Tu as pêché un poisson légendaire! __+[AMOUNT] Points__**
